name: ext_R3_ExpansionProfile
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ExpansionProfile for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ExpansionProfile from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExpansionProfile|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R2.
